Green Screen Web Page

INSTRUCTIONS:
*select the foreground image button and choose the image with green background which you want to be your foreground image.
* now select the background image button and choose the image which you want as your background in the foreground image.
*click on the "create composite" button to merge the two images.
*two clear the canvas click on the "clear canvas" button.
*remember you can't select more than one image for foreground or background images.
